mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_gallery(num, writer, caption, saveFileName, regdate) VALUES (board_gallery_seq.nextval, #{writer }, #{caption }, #{saveFileName }, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, writer, caption, saveFileName, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_gallery order by num desc) WHERE num= #{num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, caption, saveFileName, regdate FROM board_gallery ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
